name: William McRaven
summary: Retired four-star admiral who oversaw the raid that killed Osama bin Laden and called Trump's attacks on the media 'the greatest threat to democracy' he has seen in his lifetime.

keyStatements.quote: I would consider it an honor if you would revoke my security clearance as well, so I can add my name to the list of men and women who have spoken up against your presidency.
keyStatements.context: After Trump revoked John Brennan's clearance

keyStatements.quote: If you think for a moment that your McCarthy-era tactics will suppress the voices of criticism, you are sadly mistaken. The criticism will continue until you become the leader we prayed you would be.
This president has shown that he is willing to attack the very institutions that keep our democracy intact. That is the greatest threat to democracy in my lifetime.
